org.apache.juneau.rest.client.mock

Class MockHttpClientConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.rest.client.mock.MockHttpClientConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.apache.http.HttpClientConnection, org.apache.http.HttpConnection
    Deprecated. 
    Use org.apache.juneau.rest.mock2

    @Deprecated
public class MockHttpClientConnection
extends Object
implements org.apache.http.HttpClientConnection
    An implementation of HttpClientConnection specifically for use in mocked connections using the MockHttpConnection class. This implementation is NOT thread safe.
